Package util

Class helper

java.lang.Object
util.helper
public class helper extends Object
Helper class in util to reduce code with simple tools and methods used often throughout this project. Index error in loadView, all code in loadCustTableView was initially in MainController. When using observable list to try and create a customer object the callback function wouldn't work since the index was searching for string but found the customer object.

    • loadTableView

      public static javafx.scene.control.TableView loadTableView(ResultSet resultSet, javafx.scene.control.TableView tV) throws SQLException
      loadTableView Gets the result set of appointments and tableview to populate and return a dynamic tableview. LAMBDA USE: To create a dynamic table for the main display, the tablecolumn will loop through the column count for the desired resultSet. Setting the column cell from a specific row then returning it as the simple string property in the temporary column.
      Parameters:
      resultSet - Result Set
      tV - Table View
      Returns:
      Dynamic Table View
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • loadCustomerTableView

      public static javafx.scene.control.TableView loadCustomerTableView(ResultSet resultSet, javafx.scene.control.TableView tV) throws SQLException
      loadCustTableView loadView is used for multiple sql statements that will populate the customer tableview without needing to add multiple views for each query. ERROR when trying to create list of customer objects instead of string. LAMBDA USE: To create a dynamic table for the main display, the tablecolumn will loop through the column count for the desired resultSet. Setting the column cell from a specific row then returning it as the simple string property in the temporary column.
      Parameters:
      resultSet - getting the result set from the sql query.
      tV - table view to keep out null errors.
      Returns:
      returns the table view.
      Throws:
      SQLException
